</head> <body> <div id="menu" py:if="desc.classes"> <ul> <li class="header" py:content="desc.pathname" /> <li py:for="class_ in desc.classes"><a href="${class_.details}" style="text-transform: none" py:content="class_.name" /></li> </ul> </div> <div id="content" class="api"> <h1>Overview</h1> <py:match path="div[@class='section']" py:replace="select('*|text()')" /> ${project.render_description(desc)} <h1 py:if="desc.modules">Sub-Modules</h1> <py:for each="module in desc.modules" py:if="module.pathname not in project.options.exclude_modules" py:replace="describe(module)" /> <h1 py:if="desc.classes">Classes</h1> <py:for each="class_ in desc.classes" py:replace="describe(class_)" /> <h1 py:if="desc.functions">Functions</h1> <py:for each="function in desc.functions" py:replace="describe(function)" /> </div> </body> </html>
